artist: Designer: Charles A. Bailey; Manufacturer: J. & E. Stevens Company, Cromwell, Connecticut, 1843–1950s
description: giant black pig with red lips and pink nose; Otto von Bismarck emerges from pig's back
inscription:
Inscription and Sticker

On proper right side of pig inscribed: [BISMARK BANK]
markings: on bottom, on sticker: [17G 1-4-5 / \"Bismark Bank\" / 772007.50 32000 / 5 1700 / M 193 AD 73000]
title: "Bismark [sic] Bank" mechanical bank
